00001 #include "eol_particle_emitter.h"

00003 eolVec3D eol_particle_emitter_get_point_by_shape(eolUint shape,
00004                                                  eolVec3D point,
00005                                                  eolVec3D variance,
00006                                                  eolVec3D rotation)
00007 {
00008   eolVec3D out;
00009   eol_vec3d_clear(out);
00010   switch (shape)
00011   {
00012     case eolEmmitterPoint:
00013       out.x = point.x + (crandom() * variance.x);
00014       out.y = point.y + (crandom() * variance.y);
00015       out.z = point.z + (crandom() * variance.z);
00016       break;
00017     case eolEmmitterSquare:
00018       out.x = point.x + (crandom() * variance.x);
00019       out.y = point.y + (crandom() * variance.y);
00020       /*TODO;rotate about*/
00021       break;
00022     case eolEmmitterCircle:
00023       break;
00024     case eolEmmitterSphere:
00025       break;
00026     case eolEmmitterModel:
00027       break;
00028     case eolEmmitterActor:
00029       break;
00030   }
00031   return out;
00032 }

00034 void eol_particle_emitter_from_config(eolConfig *config,
00035                                       eolVec3D point,
00036                                       eolVec3D direction,
00037                                       eolVec3D color,
00038                                       eolFloat alpha)
00039 {
00040   eolParticle *part = NULL;
00041   int particleType = 0;
00042   eolLine partTypeName;
00043   int shapeType = 0;
00044   eolLine shapeName;
00045   eolUint count = 0,i;
00046   eolVec3D variance = {0,0,0};
00047   eolVec3D rotation = {0,0,0};
00048   if (!config)return;
00049   
00050   if (!eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&count,config,"count"))
00051   {
00052     count = 1;
00053   }
00054 
00055   eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&variance,config,"variance");
00056 
00057   eol_config_get_line_by_tag(partTypeName,config,"type");
00058   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"sprite") == 0)
00059   {
00060     particleType = eolParticleSprite;
00061   }
00062   else if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"trail") == 0)
00063   {
00064     particleType = eolParticleTrail;
00065   }
00066   else if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"model") == 0)
00067   {
00068     particleType = eolParticleModel;
00069   }
00070   else if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"actor") == 0)
00071   {
00072     particleType = eolParticleActor;
00073   }
00074   else
00075   {
00076     particleType = eolParticlePoint;
00077   }
00078 
00079   eol_config_get_line_by_tag(shapeName,config,"shape");
00080   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"square") == 0)
00081   {
00082     shapeType = eolEmmitterSquare;
00083   }
00084   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"circle") == 0)
00085   {
00086     shapeType = eolEmmitterCircle;
00087   }
00088   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"sphere") == 0)
00089   {
00090     shapeType = eolEmmitterSphere;
00091   }
00092   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"Model") == 0)
00093   {
00094     shapeType = eolEmmitterModel;
00095   }
00096   if (eol_line_cmp(partTypeName,"actor") == 0)
00097   {
00098     shapeType = eolEmmitterActor;
00099   }
00100   
00101   for (i = 0;i < count;i++)
00102   {
00103     part = eol_particle_new();
00104     if (!part)return;
00105     part->type = particleType;
00106     eol_vec3d_copy(part->ori.position,eol_particle_emitter_get_point_by_shape(shapeType,point,variance,rotation));
00107     switch (part->type)
00108     {
00109       case eolParticlePoint:
00110         break;
00111       case eolParticleTrail:
00112         break;
00113       case eolParticleSprite:
00114         break;
00115       case eolParticleModel:
00116         break;
00117       case eolParticleActor:
00118         break;
00119     }
00120   }
00121  /* @param type [point, sprite, actor]
00122  * @param actor path to the actor to use for this particle
00123  * @param count uint how many particles are to be created  (for entity, this is per update)
00124  * @param lifetime uint how long the particles should live before timing out in server ticks
00125  * @param lifetimeVariance float how much variation should be applied to lifetime
00126  * @param shape [point|square|circle|sphere] shape of the creation point for the particles
00127  * @param vector vec3D direction the particles should move in (0,0,0 is viable)
00128  * @param vectorVariance vec3D percentage that the vector will vary by component
00129  * @param accelation vec3D direction the particles will acclerate in (0,0,0 is viable)
00130  * @param AccelVariance vec3D percentage that the acceleration will vary by component
00131  * @param color vec3D the default color that this should be (will be multiplied by input color)
00132  * @param colorVariance vec3D percentage that the color will vary by component
00133  * @param colorVector vec3D change in color over time
00134  * @param colorVector vec3D change in color over time
00135  * @param alpha float transparecy
00136  * @param alphaVariance float percentage that the alpha will vary by component
00137  * @param alphaVector float change in alpha over time
00138  * @param drawTrail
00139  * @param trailTaper
00140  * @param trailFade*/
00141 }
00142 
00143 void eol_particle_emitter_die(eolEntity *self)
00144 {
00145   self->state = eolEntityDead;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void eol_particle_emitter_update(eolEntity *self)
00149 {
00150   if (!self->config)
00151   {
00152     eol_particle_emitter_die(self);
00153     return;
00154   }
00155   eol_particle_emitter_from_config(self->config,
00156                                    self->ori.position,
00157                                    self->ori.rotation,
00158                                    self->ori.color,
00159                                    self->ori.alpha);
00160   if (self->state > eolEntityDead)self->state--;
00161 }
00162 
00163 eolEntity * eol_particle_spawn_emitter_from_config(eolLine  configFile,
00164                                                    eolVec3D point,
00165                                                    eolVec3D vector,
00166                                                    eolVec3D rotation,
00167                                                    eolVec3D color,
00168                                                    eolFloat alpha)
00169 {
00170   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00171   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00172   conf = eol_config_load(configFile);
00173   if (!conf)
00174   {
00175     return NULL;
00176   }
00177   ent = eol_entity_new();
00178   if (!ent)
00179   {
00180     eol_config_free(&conf);
00181     return NULL;
00182   }
00183   ent->update = eol_particle_emitter_update;
00184   ent->config = conf;
00185   eol_vec3d_copy(ent->ori.position,point);
00186   eol_vec3d_copy(ent->ori.rotation,rotation);
00187   eol_vec3d_copy(ent->vector.position,vector);
00188   eol_vec3d_copy(ent->ori.color,color);
00189   ent->ori.alpha = alpha;
00190 
00191   if(eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&ent->state,conf,"entityLifetime"))
00192   {
00193       ent->state += eolEntityDead;
00194   }
00195 
00196   eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&ent->vector.color,conf,"entityColorVector");
00197   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&ent->vector.alpha,conf,"entityAlphaVector");
00198   eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&ent->vector.rotation,conf,"entityRotationVector");
00199   
00200   return ent;
00201 }
